basics.label: Maintenance Specialist/Technician
basics.summary: Military veteran and journeyman electrician seeking to retain current position as a maintenance specialist at TWPC. Served four years active duty in a role of increasing responsibility and one year as a maintenance specialist at TWPC. Have prior experience in logistics and embarkation management, electronics troubleshooting, electrical maintenance and preventative maintenance. Effective communicator and leader in the work areas.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Operated on and repaired gear used in F-18 fighter jets, EA-6B Electronic counter- measures jets, or AV-8B close ground support jets
highlights: Became the Safety-supervisor for work center of 63 Marines
Managed and supervised 12 Marines that performed maintenance and three Marines that performed logistics and embarkation operations
